member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ExpandBaseTask
member.summary: Summary description for ExpandTask.

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ExpandBaseTask.ExtractFile(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int64)
member.summary: Extracts a file entry from the specified stream.
member.param: The containing the compressed entry.
The directory where to store the expanded file.
The name of the entry including directory information.
The date of the entry.
The uncompressed size of the entry.

exception.para: The destination directory for the entry could not be created.
The entry could not be extracted.

member.remarks: We cannot rely on the fact that the directory entry of a given file is created before the file is extracted, so we should create the directory if it doesn't yet exist.

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ExpandBaseTask.ExtractDirectory(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Extracts a directory entry from the specified stream.
member.param: The containing the directory entry.
The directory where to create the subdirectory.
The name of the directory entry.
The date of the entry.

exception.para: The destination directory for the entry could not be created.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ExpandBaseTask.Overwrite
member.summary: Overwrite files, even if they are newer than the corresponding entries in the archive. The default is .

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.GUnzip
member.summary: Expands a file packed using GZip compression.

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.GUnzip.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Extracts the file from the gzip archive.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.GUnzip.SrcFile
member.summary: The file to expand.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.GUnzip.DestFile
member.summary: The destination file.

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask
member.summary: Creates a tar file from the specified filesets.

remarks.para: Uses #ziplib (SharpZipLib), an open source Tar/Zip/GZip library written entirely in C#.

example.para: Tar all files in ${build.dir} and ${doc.dir} into a file called "backup.tar.gz", and apply gzip compression to it.
example.code: <tar destfile="backup.tar.gz" compression="GZip"> <fileset basedir="${bin.dir}" prefix="bin"> <include name="**/*" /> </fileset> <fileset basedir="${doc.dir}" prefix="doc"> <include name="**/*" /> </fileset> </tar>

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Creates the tar file.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask.DestFile
member.summary: The tar file to create.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask.IncludeEmptyDirs
member.summary: Include empty directories in the generated tar file. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask.TarFileSets
member.summary: The set of files to be included in the archive.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.TarTask.CompressionMethod
member.summary: The compression method. The default is .

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnTarTask
member.summary: Extracts files from a tar archive.

remarks.para: Uses #ziplib (SharpZipLib), an open source Zip/GZip library written entirely in C#.

example.para: Extracts all files from a gzipped tar, preserving the directory structure.

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnTarTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Extracts the files from the archive.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnTarTask.SrcFile
member.summary: The archive file to expand.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnTarTask.DestinationDirectory
member.summary: The directory where to store the expanded file(s). The default is the project base directory.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnTarTask.CompressionMethod
member.summary: The compression method. The default is .

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnZipTask
member.summary: Extracts files from a zip archive.

remarks.para: Uses #ziplib (SharpZipLib), an open source Zip/GZip library written entirely in C#.

example.para: Extracts all the file from the zip, preserving the directory structure.

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnZipTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Extracts the files from the zip file.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnZipTask.ZipFile
member.summary: The archive file to expand.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnZipTask.ToDirectory
member.summary: The directory where the expanded files should be stored. The default is the project base directory.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.UnZipTask.Encoding
member.summary: The character encoding that has been used for filenames inside the zip file. The default is the system's OEM code page.

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask
member.summary: Creates a zip file from the specified filesets.

remarks.para: Uses #ziplib (SharpZipLib), an open source Tar/Zip/GZip library written entirely in C#.

example.para: Zip all files in ${build.dir} and ${doc.dir} into a file called "backup.zip".
example.code: <zip zipfile="backup.zip"> <fileset basedir="${bin.dir}" prefix="bin"> <include name="**/*" /> </fileset> <fileset basedir="${doc.dir}" prefix="doc"> <include name="**/*" /> </fileset> </zip>

member.name: M:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Creates the zip file.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.ZipFile
member.summary: The zip file to create.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.Comment
member.summary: The comment for the file.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.Stamp
member.summary: Date/time stamp for the files in the format MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.ZipLevel
member.summary: Desired level of compression. Possible values are 0 (STORE only) to 9 (highest). The default is 6.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.IncludeEmptyDirs
member.summary: Include empty directories in the generated zip file. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.ZipFileSets
member.summary: The set of files to be included in the archive.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.DuplicateHandling
member.summary: Specifies the behaviour when a duplicate file is found. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Tasks.ZipTask.Encoding
member.summary: The character encoding to use for filenames and comment inside the zip file. The default is the system's OEM code page.

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Types.DuplicateHandling
member.summary: Specifies how entries with the same name should be processed.

member.name: F:NAnt.Compression.Types.DuplicateHandling.Add
member.summary: Overwrite existing entry with same name.

member.name: F:NAnt.Compression.Types.DuplicateHandling.Preserve
member.summary: Preserve existing entry with the same name.

member.name: F:NAnt.Compression.Types.DuplicateHandling.Fail
member.summary: Report failure when two entries have the same name.

member.summary: Specialized for that ignores case when converting from string.

member.summary: Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.

A object. If a is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The to convert.
member.returns: An that represents the converted value.

member.name: T:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet
member.summary: A is a with extra attributes useful in the context of the .

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.FileMode
member.summary: A 3 digit octal string, specify the user, group and other modes in the standard Unix fashion. Only applies to plain files. The default is 644.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.DirMode
member.summary: A 3 digit octal string, specify the user, group and other modes in the standard Unix fashion. Only applies to directories. The default is 755.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.UserName
member.summary: The username for the tar entry.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.Uid
member.summary: The user identifier (UID) for the tar entry.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.GroupName
member.summary: The groupname for the tar entry.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.Gid
member.summary: The group identifier (GID) for the tar entry.

member.name: P:NAnt.Compression.Types.TarFileSet.Prefix
member.summary: The top level directory prefix. If set, all file and directory paths in the fileset will have this value prepended. Can either be a single directory name or a "/" separated path.
